classdef.name: Synchronize VIMS Clock with Office

propertydef.name: machines
propertydef.description: The machines to be configured

classdef.description: Synchronize VIMS Clock with Office time.

classdef.name: Configure VIMS Wireless Messaging

propertydef.name: machines
propertydef.description: The machines to be configured

propertydef.name: activate
propertydef.label: Action
propertydef.description: Indicates whether the unsolicited wireless messaging should be activated or deactivated

classdef.description: Configure the VIMS box to send VIMS health and production messages direct to the office. Used for Health-ONLY sites. Not to be used in conjuction with CD550 or CAES.

classdef.name: Legacy Configure VIMS Wireless Messaging

propertydef.name: machines
propertydef.description: The machines to be configured

propertydef.name: activate
propertydef.label: Action
propertydef.description: Indicates whether the unsolicited wireless messaging should be activated or deactivated

propertydef.name: locationIncluded
propertydef.label: Location
propertydef.description: Include location in messages, if available

propertydef.name: broadcastIncluded
propertydef.label: Include Broadcast Entries
propertydef.description: Include Broadcast entries in messages

classdef.description: Configure the VIMS box to send VIMS health and production messages direct to the office. Used for Health-ONLY sites. Not to be used in conjuction with CD550 or CAES.

classdef.name: DataLogger Activate

propertydef.name: machines
propertydef.description: The machines to be activated or deactivated

propertydef.name: activate
propertydef.label: Action
propertydef.description: Indicates whether the datalogger should be activated or deactivated

classdef.description: Activate or deactivate a Datalogger on a VIMS ABL enabled machine.

classdef.name: Snapshot Activate

propertydef.name: machines
propertydef.description: The machines to be affected

propertydef.name: activate
propertydef.label: Action
propertydef.description: Indicates whether the snapshot should be activated or deactivated

classdef.description: Manually trigger a Snapshot on a VIMS ABL enabled machine.

classdef.name: VIMS Legacy File Download

propertydef.name: machines
propertydef.description: Files will only be downloaded from included machines

propertydef.name: fileList
propertydef.description: Selected file types will be downloaded

propertydef.name: useMachinePush
propertydef.label: Machine to send file
propertydef.description: Files will be sent to office by capable machines. If option is not enabled or machine is not capable then files will be downloaded from machine.

propertydef.name: onceOnly
propertydef.label: Download once
propertydef.description: Download at most one copy of each file for each machine into the unprocessed directory

propertydef.name: directory
propertydef.label: Base Directory
propertydef.description: Base directory for files.

propertydef.name: download
propertydef.label: Downloaded Files
propertydef.description: Subdirectory for raw downloaded files.

propertydef.name: unprocessed
propertydef.label: Unprocessed Files
propertydef.description: Subdirectory for unprocessed files.

classdef.description: Download VIMS data files from a VIMS ABL enabled machine.

classdef.name: VIMS File Download

propertydef.name: machines
propertydef.description: Files will only be downloaded from included machines

propertydef.name: fileList
propertydef.description: Selected file types will be downloaded

propertydef.name: requestDelay
propertydef.label: Request delay
propertydef.description: The delay in seconds between file download requests. Values higher than 30 will be regarded as a delay of 30, zero or less than 0 will be regarded as 0.

propertydef.name: onceOnly
propertydef.label: Download once
propertydef.description: Download at most one copy of each file for each machine into the unprocessed directory

propertygroup.name: setClockOptions
propertygroup.label: Set Clock Options (ignored if Set Clock is disabled)

propertydef.name: directory
propertydef.label: Base Directory
propertydef.description: Base directory for files.

propertydef.name: download
propertydef.label: Downloaded Files
propertydef.description: Subdirectory for raw downloaded files.

propertydef.name: unprocessed
propertydef.label: Unprocessed Files
propertydef.description: Subdirectory for unprocessed files.

classdef.description: Download VIMS data files from a VIMS ABL or VIMS 3G enabled machine.

classdef.name: VIMS File Copy

propertydef.name: import.machines
propertydef.description: Select all machines to copy files from machines that exists in MineStar. Select nothing to copy files from any machine.

propertydef.name: import.fileTypes
propertydef.description: Select nothing to copy files of any type

propertydef.name: upload.machines
propertydef.description: Select all machines to copy files from machines that exists in MineStar. Select nothing to copy files from any machine.

propertydef.name: upload.fileTypes
propertydef.description: Select nothing to copy files of any type

propertydef.name: directory
propertydef.label: Base Directory
propertydef.description: Base directory for files.

propertydef.name: unprocessed
propertydef.label: Unprocessed Files
propertydef.description: Subdirectory for unprocessed files.

propertydef.name: importStaging
propertydef.label: Import Staging
propertydef.description: Subdirectory for files staging to be imported

propertydef.name: uploadStaging
propertydef.label: Upload Staging
propertydef.description: Folder(s) for files staging to be uploaded. Separate multiple folder names by commas.

propertydef.name: ignoredFiles
propertydef.label: Ignored Files
propertydef.description: Subdirectory for files ignored

propertydef.name: deleteFiles
propertydef.label: Delete files after they have been copied to designated folders.

classdef.description: Copy VIMS files to designated folders

propertydef.name: machines
propertydef.description: Only files from selected machines will be uploaded.

propertydef.name: fileTypes
propertydef.description: Only files of selected types will be uploaded.

propertydef.name: uploadedAction
propertydef.label: Action after successful upload
propertydef.description: The designated folder for the 'Move File' option can be changed in 'Directory Options' tab

propertydef.name: ftp.protocol1
propertydef.label: Protocol
propertydef.description: Please note host key checking is not supported for SFTP transfer

propertydef.name: ftp.host1
propertydef.label: Network Address
propertydef.description: Port number is supported e.g. "127.0.0.1:21", default to 21 for FTP and 22 for SFTP if not specified

propertydef.name: ftp.remotePath1
propertydef.label: Destination FTP path
propertydef.description: By default files are transferred to root folder of FTP server

propertydef.name: ftp.fileNameScheme1
propertydef.label: Destination file name scheme
propertydef.description: Naming scheme to use for files uploaded to destination

propertydef.name: ftp.protocol2
propertydef.label: Protocol
propertydef.description: Please note host key checking is not supported for SFTP transfer

propertydef.name: ftp.host2
propertydef.label: Network Address
propertydef.description: Port number is supported e.g. "127.0.0.1:21", default to 21 for FTP and 22 for SFTP if not specified

propertydef.name: ftp.remotePath2
propertydef.label: Destination FTP path
propertydef.description: By default files are transferred to root folder of FTP server

propertydef.name: ftp.fileNameScheme2
propertydef.label: Destination file name scheme
propertydef.description: Naming scheme to use for files uploaded to destination

propertydef.name: ftp.protocol3
propertydef.label: Protocol
propertydef.description: Please note host key checking is not supported for SFTP transfer

propertydef.name: ftp.host3
propertydef.label: Network Address
propertydef.description: Port number is supported e.g. "127.0.0.1:21", default to 21 for FTP and 22 for SFTP if not specified

propertydef.name: ftp.remotePath3
propertydef.label: Destination FTP path
propertydef.description: By default files are transferred to root folder of FTP server

propertydef.name: ftp.fileNameScheme3
propertydef.label: Destination file name scheme
propertydef.description: Naming scheme to use for files uploaded to destination

propertydef.name: directory
propertydef.label: Base Directory
propertydef.description: Base directory for files.

propertydef.name: unprocessed
propertydef.label: Unprocessed Files
propertydef.description: Subdirectory for unprocessed files.

propertydef.name: uploadStagingDir
propertydef.label: Upload Staging
propertydef.description: Subdirectory for files waiting to be uploaded.

propertydef.name: uploadedDir
propertydef.label: Uploaded Files
propertydef.description: Subdirectory for files successfully uploaded (Files are moved to this folder if 'Move Files' option is selected in the job configuration page).

propertydef.name: uploadFailedDir
propertydef.label: Files failed to upload
propertydef.description: Subdirectory for files failed to upload to any one of the FTP locations

classdef.name: VIMS Data Import

propertydef.name: machines
propertydef.description: Only files from selected machines will be imported.

propertydef.name: fileTypes
propertydef.description: Only files of selected types will be imported.

propertydef.name: verbose
propertydef.label: Verbose
propertydef.description: Produce more verbose output

propertydef.name: autoCreate
propertydef.label: Auto-create
propertydef.description: Automatically create a machine record when processing a file from an unknown machine.

propertydef.name: concurrentProcessing
propertydef.label: Process files concurrently
propertydef.description: Process files concurrently. If enabled processes large file sets quicker but uses more computing resources.

propertydef.name: deleteFirst
propertydef.label: Delete existing records
propertydef.description: Delete any existing matching records before importing to refresh data.

propertydef.name: asaCalculation
propertydef.label: Perform FPO Calculation
propertydef.description: Process datalogs to calculate FPO Haul Road Condition Index.

propertydef.name: ignoreOperator
propertydef.label: Ignore operator
propertydef.description: Ignore operator-related information

propertydef.name: createServiceMeterReading
propertydef.label: Create Service Meter Reading
propertydef.description: Creates Service Meter Reading objects from available SMU data.

propertydef.name: importAllData
propertydef.label: Import all data in files
propertydef.description: Forces import of ALL data in files. By default, only data recorded since last download is imported. Enabling import of all data will increase database size and potentially cause duplicate data to be recorded if files are not reset regularly.

propertydef.name: directory
propertydef.label: Base Directory
propertydef.description: Base directory for files.

propertydef.name: processed
propertydef.label: Processed Files
propertydef.description: Subdirectory for processed files.

propertydef.name: unprocessed
propertydef.label: Unprocessed Files
propertydef.description: Subdirectory for unprocessed files.

propertydef.name: badFiles
propertydef.label: Bad Files
propertydef.description: Subdirectory for bad files.

propertydef.name: ascFiles
propertydef.label: ASCII Files
propertydef.description: Subdirectory for exported ASCII files.

propertydef.name: sortByType
propertydef.label: Sort files by type
propertydef.description: After processing, move file into subdirectory for specific file type.

propertydef.name: sortByMachine
propertydef.label: Sort files by Machine
propertydef.description: After processing, move file into subdirectory for specific machine.

propertydef.name: includeSubdirectories
propertydef.label: Include unprocessed files in sub-folders
propertydef.description: Import files from sub-folder of the unprocessed folder.

propertydef.name: deleteSubdirectories
propertydef.label: Delete unprocessed sub-folders after import
propertydef.description: Deletes sub-folder of the unprocessed folder after import.

classdef.description: Import VIMS files into the MineStar database.

classdef.name: VIMS Current Status

propertydef.name: machines
propertydef.description: Vims Current Status will be fetched only from selected machines. Maximum 20 machines can be selected.

classdef.description: Trigger the VimsCurrentStatusRequest, or legacy VIMS fuel level request, for selected machines.

propertydef.name: machines
propertydef.description: Only files from selected machines will be imported.

propertydef.description: Date format used in files to import. See SimpleDateFormat (http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/text/SimpleDateFormat.html) for date format patterns.

propertydef.name: verbose
propertydef.label: Verbose
propertydef.description: Produce more verbose output

propertydef.name: autoCreate
propertydef.label: Auto-create
propertydef.description: Automatically create a machine record when processing a file from an unknown machine.

propertydef.name: directory

propertydef.description: Base directory for files.

propertydef.name: processed

propertydef.description: Subdirectory for processed files.

propertydef.name: unprocessed
propertydef.label: Unprocessed Files
propertydef.description: Subdirectory for unprocessed files.

propertydef.name: badFiles
propertydef.label: Bad Files
propertydef.description: Subdirectory for bad files.

classdef.description: Import Fluid Management files into the MineStar database.

propertydef.name: dsiTypes
propertydef.description: Select nothing to copy files of any type

propertygroup.name: retentionPeriod
propertygroup.label: VIMS VP3 Data Post Processing Duration

propertydef.name: retainedPeriod

type.choices: { "Shift":"Shift", "Last 1":"Last Week", "Last 2":"Last 2 Weeks", "Last 3":"Last 3 Weeks", "Last 4":"Last 4 Weeks", "Last 12":"Last 3 Months", "Last 26":"Last 6 Months", "Last 52":"Last 12 Months", "year":"Year", "half":"Half", "quarter":"Quarter", "month":"Month", "week":"Week", "day":"Day", "none":"All Data" }

propertydef.description: VIms Post Processing data limit, Earlier data will not be considered.

classdef.name: Health Data Deletion

propertydef.name: fileTypes
propertydef.label: Types
propertydef.description: Only files of selected types will be deleted.

propertydef.name: machines
propertydef.description: Only dataset from selected machines will be deleted. If no machines are selected, datasets for all machines are deleted.

propertydef.name: retainedPeriod

type.choices: { "Shift":"Shift", "Last 1":"Last Week", "Last 2":"Last 2 Weeks", "Last 3":"Last 3 Weeks", "Last 4":"Last 4 Weeks", "Last 12":"Last 3 Months", "Last 26":"Last 6 Months", "Last 52":"Last 12 Months", "year":"Year", "half":"Half", "quarter":"Quarter", "month":"Month", "week":"Week", "day":"Day", "none":"Do not retain any data" }

propertydef.description: Retain data for this period. Earlier data will be deleted.

classdef.description: Delete VIMS data from MineStar database.
